mapper.insert:
insert into msa_current_increase(id, symbol, name, code, max, min, increase, two_increase, thress_increase, four_increase, five_increase, ten_increase, fifteen_increase, twenty_increase, max_increase, increases, volumes, future_five_day_increase, future_ten_day_increase, future_fifteen_day_increase, future_twenty_day_increase, future_increases, future_volumes, day_volume_avg, two_volume_avg, three_volume_avg, four_volume_avg, five_volume_avg, first_level_day, first_level_increase, second_level_day, second_level_increase, third_level_day, third_level_increase, four_level_day, four_level_increase, five_level_day, five_level_increase, stock_type, msa_day, volume, close, pre_increase, pre_volume, pre_close, future_one_day_increase, future_two_day_increase, future_three_day_increase) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.symbol}, #{item.name}, #{item.code}, #{item.max}, #{item.min}, #{item.increase}, #{item.twoIncrease}, #{item.thressIncrease}, #{item.fourIncrease}, #{item.fiveIncrease}, #{item.tenIncrease}, #{item.fifteenIncrease}, #{item.twentyIncrease}, #{item.maxIncrease}, #{item.increases}, #{item.volumes}, #{item.futureFiveDayIncrease}, #{item.futureTenDayIncrease}, #{item.futureFifteenDayIncrease}, #{item.futureTwentyDayIncrease}, #{item.futureIncreases}, #{item.futureVolumes}, #{item.dayVolumeAvg}, #{item.twoVolumeAvg}, #{item.threeVolumeAvg}, #{item.fourVolumeAvg}, #{item.fiveVolumeAvg}, #{item.firstLevelDay}, #{item.firstLevelIncrease}, #{item.secondLevelDay}, #{item.secondLevelIncrease}, #{item.thirdLevelDay}, #{item.thirdLevelIncrease}, #{item.fourLevelDay}, #{item.fourLevelIncrease}, #{item.fiveLevelDay}, #{item.fiveLevelIncrease}, #{item.stockType}, #{item.msaDay}, #{item.volume}, #{item.close}, #{item.preIncrease}, #{item.preVolume}, #{item.preClose}, #{item.futureOneDayIncrease}, #{item.futureTwoDayIncrease}, #{item.futureThreeDayIncrease})
mapper.select:
select count(1) from msa_current_increase a
a.symbol = #{symbol} and
left(a.symbol, 1) !='3' and
a.stock_type = #{stockType} and
a.${limitField} between #{min} and #{max} and
a.${limitField} >= #{min} and
a.${limitField} <= #{max} and
a.msa_day = #{end}

select , cast(left(b.code,1) as unsigned integer) stockCategory from msa_current_increase a left join stock b on a.symbol = b.symbol
a.symbol = #{symbol} and
left(a.symbol, 1) !='3' and
a.stock_type = #{stockType} and
a.${limitField} between #{min} and #{max} and
a.${limitField} >= #{min} and
a.${limitField} <= #{max} and
a.msa_day = #{end}
order by ${sortField} ascdesc
limit 0, #{bizLimit}
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(1) from msa_current_increase a
a.increase >= 9.5 and a.pre_increase >= 9.5 and
a.symbol = #{symbol} and
a.stock_type = #{stockType} and
a.${limitField} between #{min} and #{max} and
a.${limitField} >= #{min} and
a.${limitField} <= #{max} and
a.msa_day >= #{begin} and
a.msa_day <= #{end} and

select , cast(left(b.code,1) as unsigned integer) stockCategory from msa_current_increase a left join stock b on a.symbol = b.symbol
a.increase >= 9.5 and a.pre_increase >= 9.5 and
a.symbol = #{symbol} and
a.stock_type = #{stockType} and
a.${limitField} between #{min} and #{max} and
a.${limitField} >= #{min} and
a.${limitField} <= #{max} and
a.msa_day >= #{begin} and
a.msa_day <= #{end} and
order by (second_level_increase + third_level_increase) ascdesc
limit 0, #{bizLimit}
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
